scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_cache && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && mkdir node_modules && npm install && LC_ALL=C
scripts.build:find_changed_charts: echo 'Comparing checksums of current files with those created after last build...' && node build/findChangedCharts.js
scripts.build:images_casper: npm run server && node node_modules/casperjs/bin/casperjs.js build/createImagesCasper.js && npm run stop-server
scripts.build:umwelt_charts: node node_modules/casperjs/bin/casperjs.js build/createUmweltberichtConfigs.js && echo 'Cleaning Umwelt config files...' && node build/cleanUmweltberichtConfigs.js
scripts.build:optimize_images: echo 'Optimizing svg images...' && node build/optimizeImages.js && echo '...done optimizing images!'
scripts.build:optimize_all_images: echo 'Optimizing svg images...' && svgo --pretty --multipass -f images/portal/ && svgo --pretty --multipass -f images/indikatorenset/ && echo '...done optimizing images!'
scripts.build:save_checksums: echo 'Saving checksums of newly built charts...' && node build/saveChecksums.js
scripts.build:copy_modules: echo 'Copying required node_modules to assets/js/modules...' && copy-node-modules . assets/js -v && rm -rf assets/js/modules && mv assets/js/node_modules assets/js/modules
scripts.build: LC_ALL=C && npm run build:database && npm run build:find_changed_charts && npm run build:partial_databases && npm run build:charts && npm run build:images  && npm run build:images_viewbox && npm run build:optimize_images && npm run build:save_checksums && npm run build:copy_modules && npm run build:copy_data_per_set
scripts.rebuild: LC_ALL=C && echo 'Deleting metadat/all/hashesAfterBuild.json in order to trigger build of all charts...' && rm metadata/all/hashesAfterBuild.json & echo 'Running npm run build...' && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.deploy:ftp: echo "Fake uploading to FTP server..." && exit 0
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:gh-pages && npm run deploy:ftp && pwd
scripts.set-environment-variables: export HIGHCHARTS_VERSION=6.1.1 && export ACCEPT_HIGHCHARTS_LICENSE=YES && export HIGHCHARTS_USE_STYLED=NO && export HIGHCHARTS_USE_MAPS=YES &&  LC_ALL=C
scripts.start-export-server: echo 'Starting highcharts-export-server using forever...' && forever start node_modules/highcharts-export-server/bin/cli.js --enableServer 1 --port 8081 --killSignal SIGINT
scripts.preinstall: export ACCEPT_HIGHCHARTS_LICENSE=1 && export HIGHCHARTS_USE_STYLED=NO && export HIGHCHARTS_VERSION=6.1.1 && LC_ALL=C
